dashboard.description: Metrics for the host machine [dockprom default dash]

panels.description: Load values are out of 8 (number of cores/threads). Greater than 8 indicates that processes are waiting for CPU time
panels.title: CPU Load
Timeseries - Folder Sizes - Monitoring DBs & Plex [Docker Containers]

targets.legendFormat: Inactive - Memory which has been less recently used.  It is more eligible to be reclaimed for other purposes
Active - Memory that has been used more recently and usually not reclaimed unless absolutely necessary

links.title: S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 193 - Load Cycle Count; Load/Unload Cycle Count
S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 197 - Current Pending Sector Count

targets.query: SELECT last("total") AS "total", last("used") AS "used", last("free") AS "free", last("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /\/$|^.mnt|^.storage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"

panels.description: Values != 1 are bad. Displayed as graph to allow alerts to be generated.
panels.title: SMART Disk Health

alert.name: SMART Raw Error Read Rate < 1 [5 min avg] (Prometheus)

panels.description:
Error Read Value / Threshold
(>1 indicates still healthy)
panels.title: SMART Raw Error Read Rate

panels.description: Critical subset of SMART metrics which can indicate imminent drive failure.

links.title: S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 197 - Current Pending Sector Count
S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 199 - UltraDMA CRC Error Count

panels.title: SMART Critical Metrics

targets.legendFormat: Time offset in between local system and reference clock
Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete
CPU {{ cpu }} - seconds spent running a process
CPU {{ cpu }} - seconds spent by processing waiting for this CPU

dashboard.title: Host
